attributes.action: Licenses for Beauty, Hair, Nails, Aesthetics
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to introduce and regulate the industry properly. For every business to follow regulations and to irradicate day courses to the public without holding the revelent qualifications to do therapys. Every beauty, nail, hair and aesthetics should be involved in a governing body in order to improve quality of work and to ensure people aren't working illegally and not avoiding paying insurance, and contributing into the system. Having control over the industry is needed to improve.
attributes.background: Stop the public, non qualified accessing beauty, nails, aesthetics courses whichout revelent college qualifications. We are experiencing illegal working, people not following Health and Safety Laws due to incorrect trainings. Courses that aren't covered by reputable company's.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308539
